Text.Page: To imbue your gear with more power, I need riftsteel. Your best bet to obtain riftmetal from powerful beings near the Great Riftâ€”beings like Risalke and Banyakas. Bring me riftmetal, and I'll turn them into riftsteel.
This riftsteel will help you imbue your battle gear with more power.
Doing so is not easy, but <PCNAME>, I have faith in you.
